posts.name: Real-time search using basic JavaScript
posts.description: A step-by-step guide on how to implement real-time search filtering in a website using basic vanilla javaScript.

posts.name: Single page architecture with JavaScript
posts.description: This blog post is a beginner's guide to SPA or single page architecture. It talks about why SPA is important and helps you build a small single page app.

posts.name: Hack to keep your Heroku web app awake 24/7
posts.description: This is a post on how to smartly keep your free Heroku server awake 24/7. It involves a bit of coding and a lot of relief.
